summary: A look at the life and work of writer/filmmaker Nora Ephron.
cast: Tom Hanks|Amy Adams|Reese Witherspoon|Steven Spielberg|Meg Ryan|Meryl Streep|Stanley Tucci|Gaby Hoffmann|Liev Schreiber|Chris Messina|Steve Martin|Diane Keaton|Samantha Mathis|Rob Reiner|Lisa Kudrow|Jane Lynch|Billy Crystal|Kate Capshaw|Rita Wilson|George C. title: Todo es una copia
